text: Mir Allah Dad Talpur Halt railway station (, Sindhi: مير الهداد ٽالپور ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sindh
title: Mir Allah Dad Talpur Halt railway station
